nodes.text: BanthaQuik! was a dining establishment located in Lumchugger's Hub on the planet Bescane. They emphasized quick service and used an electronic menu system to place orders. To deliver their meals, they employed couriers which delivered their dishes on hover-scoots. Among the dishes included in their menu was the Tusken Special, Calamaria Surprise, Ithor Delight, Rodian Platter, and Corellia's Pride. Most meals were very cheap and never cost more than seven credits. The forger, "Lucky" Ordomire was known to enjoy BanthaQuik! meals.
